content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dear Colleague,\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module would help you with useful tips on improving your corporate CV, refreshing your English level, adding more interesting activities to your everyday life on bench and have full overview of everything available for your study and practice in order to get better prepared for your next assignment. And definitely to make sure that you have everything important in hands.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every section contains some useful tips together with the contacts of respective process owners.
